name: Blockboid
description:
BlockBoids

In this game you can, and will knock down buidlings, towers, or walls. You are granted with 2 weapons : RPG, C4. You can grab, destroy the blocks, you can even try to build a house, then blow it up!

Controlls:

W - forward 

S - backward

A - left

D - Right

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - detonate C4/drop cubes

Midle click - shoot C4 that sticks

E - pick up cubes 

X - delete object

I - open object spawner menu

ESC - open pause menu
